page.title: 16Summer Fete June 22nd 1985
page.content: Ysgol Hiraddug's P.T.A Fete was held on a Saturday commencing 12a.m.Amongst the attractions were the Morris Dancing Troupes from Old Colwyn, Dyserth,Buckley,Gronant,Penygroes, Blaenau Ffestniog and Bolton.A five a side soccer competition for boys and girls occupied the school field. The two finalists received a cup and medals from Eddie Niedzwieki a Welsh Soccer International Goalkeeper.The Junior Playground was the venue for a cycle B.M.X.display whilst nearby on the grass a Judo and Karate exibition took place.Numerous stalls and games were located in the school hall whilst Refreshments were sold in the canteen. An admission charge of 20p per adult and 10p per child plus the profit from the stalls amounted to 350pounds. This money will be used to buy education equipment for the school.
